casebody.data:
Leonty SAVOROFF, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 11812. United States Court of Appeals Ninth Circuit. Oct. 12, 1948. J. Gerald Williams, of Anchorage, Alaska, for appellant. J. Earl Cooper, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Anchorage, Alaska, for appellee.

Before MATHEWS, BONE, and ORR, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the District Court is affirmed.
